attributes.action: ban alcohol on the supermarkets and put them back in offlicences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that banning alcohol in the supermarkets will control the underage drinking, and help people from consuming so much. it will also help the anti social behavior.this was not a problem when i was growing up, all this has spiraled out of control since supermarkets have been selling it to easy to get hold off.once off licenses was closed that was it.
